reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Explains concepts clearly but can be strict with deadlines.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Makes math fun and easy to understand. Highly recommend!

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but lectures are a bit dry.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Engaging and enthusiastic about the subject.

reviews.review: Very helpful and offers great coding tips.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Hard to follow, lectures can be disorganized.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Encourages critical thinking and discussions.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Inspiring lectures and very approachable.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Average teaching style, but the material is tough.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Insightful lectures with real-world applications.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Passionate about art and makes the class enjoyable.

reviews.review: Very knowledgeable but gives a lot of reading.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Interesting but sometimes gets off-topic.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Amazing professor with a deep understanding of language.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Difficult exams and unclear explanations.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Great at simplifying complex concepts.

reviews.review: Interesting material, but the lectures can be monotonous.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Very passionate about the subject and engaging.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Energetic and brings life to the subject.
